errors.timeout: Oops! It seems our server is a bit busy right now. Please give it a moment and try again.
errors.internalServerError: Something went wrong on our end. Our team is on it. Please try again later.
errors.prismaClientError: An error occurred while processing your request. Please check the provided data and try again.
errors.validation: Validation error occurred, Please check your fields and try again.
errors.fallback: The language you are trying to use is not fully setup, Choose another language.
